mapper.sql: SELECT t11.`BM`, t11.`BMID`, t1.`BZ`, t11.`CHECKSTATUS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t11.`CSRQ`, t1.`CZ`, t11.`FINISHED`, t1.`FJ`, t11.`LXDH`, t1.`LZMTRID`, t1.`LZMTRNAME`, t1.`LZQX`, t11.`NL`, t11.`ZZID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`BMID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`PCMYDLZMXID`, t1.`PCMYDLZMXNAME`, t11.`PCMYDMXTYPE`, t11.`PIMPERSONID`, t41.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`REMARKS`, t1.`SFHMD`, t31.`SHORTNAME`, t11.`SXRQ`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`YGBH`, t11.`YGW`, t11.`YRANK`, t1.`YYTYPE`, t11.`YZW`, t11.`ZJHM`, t11.`ZZ`, t21.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZID` FROM `T_PCMYDLZMX` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PCMYDMX t11 ON t1.PCMYDLZMXID = t11.PCMYDMXID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t21 ON t11.ZZID = t21.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t31 ON t11.BMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t41 ON t11.PIMPERSONID = t41.PIMPERSONID

SELECT t11.BM, t11.BMID, t1.BZ, t11.CHECKSTATUS, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t11.CSRQ, t1.CZ, t11.FINISHED, t1.FJ, t11.LXDH, t1.LZMTRID, t1.LZMTRNAME, t1.LZQX, t11.NL, t11.ZZID AS ORGID, t11.BMID AS ORGSECTORID, t1.PCMYDLZMXID, t1.PCMYDLZMXNAME, t11.PCMYDMXTYPE, t11.PIMPERSONID, t41.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.REMARKS, t1.SFHMD, t31.SHORTNAME, t11.SXRQ, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t11.YGBH, t11.YGW, t11.YRANK, t1.YYTYPE, t11.YZW, t11.ZJHM, t11.ZZ, t21.ZZDZS, t11.ZZID FROM T_PCMYDLZMX t1 LEFT JOIN T_PCMYDMX t11 ON t1.PCMYDLZMXID = t11.PCMYDMXID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t21 ON t11.ZZID = t21.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t31 ON t11.BMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t41 ON t11.PIMPERSONID = t41.PIMPERSONID
